[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@remirror/react](./react.md) &gt; [Positioner](./react.positioner.md)

## Positioner interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Positioner<GExtension extends AnyExtension = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [initialPosition](./react.positioner.initialposition.md) | <code>Position</code> | The default and initial position value. This is used at the start and whenever isActive becomes false |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getPosition(params)](./react.positioner.getposition.md) | Calculate and return a new position (only called when <code>hasChanged</code> and <code>isActive</code> return true) |
|  [hasChanged(params)](./react.positioner.haschanged.md) | Determines whether anything has changed and whether to continue with a recalculation. By default this is only true when the document has changed. |
|  [isActive(params)](./react.positioner.isactive.md) | Determines whether the positioner should be active |
